formdata.description: File caption. Caption added to video, images. The maximum field length is 20000 characters.
File name. Must contain file extension. Requires UTF-8 encoding without BOM. For example: test.jpg
Quoted message Id. If present, the message will be sent quoting the specified chat message.

formdata.description: File caption. Caption added to video, images. The maximum field length is 20000 characters.
File name. Must contain file extension. Requires UTF-8 encoding without BOM. For example: test.jpg
Quoted message Id. If present, the message will be sent quoting the specified chat message.

item.name: Send video, audio, image, document via URL

request.description: Documentation [SendFileByUrl](https://greenapi.com/en/docs/api/sending/SendFileByUrl/)

header.description: In the request header, you must specify the file type Content-Type in accordance with the List of MIME types.
If the file is not in the list of MIME types, you can pass the GA-Filename header, specifying the file name with the extension. This will allow you to upload files such as .go or .py.

request.description: Documentation [UploadFile](https://greenapi.com/en/docs/api/sending/UploadFile/)

header.description: In the request header, you must specify the file type Content-Type in accordance with the List of MIME types.
If the file is not in the list of MIME types, you can pass the GA-Filename header, specifying the file name with the extension. This will allow you to upload files such as .go or .py.

request.description:
The method edits a message in a chat.

To display edited messages in the journal, you need to enable the webhook "editedMessageWebhook": "yes" with method [setSettings](https://green-api.com/en/docs/api/account/SetSettings/).

Documentation [editMessage](https://greenapi.com/en/docs/api/service/editMessage/)

The method deletes a message from a chat.

To display deleted messages in the journal, you need to enable the webhook "deletedMessageWebhook": "yes" with method [setSettings](https://green-api.com/en/docs/api/account/SetSettings/).

Documentation [DeleteMessage](https://greenapi.com/en/docs/api/service/deleteMessage/)

response.name: deleteMessage
response.body: //The response body is empty. If successful, the server response is 200.

item.name: Change the settings of disappearing chat messages

request.description: Documentation [setDisappearingChat](https://greenapi.com/en/docs/api/service/SetDisappearingChat/)

Documentation [Incoming text message with text message quote](https://greenapi.com/en/docs/api/receiving/notifications-format/incoming-message/TextMessage/#webhook-example-body)

  
To receive this type of notification, you must enable the "incomingWebhook" setting: "yes" in your personal account or using the [SetSettings](https://greenapi.com/en/docs/api/account/SetSettings/) method

body.raw:
{
    "type": "incoming",
    "idMessage": "165682394AEEFFB519B13DD51491DF65",
    "timestamp": 1709295823,
    "typeMessage": "quotedMessage",
    "chatId": "71234567890@c.us",
    "extendedTextMessage": {
        "text": "Quoting a text message",
        "stanzaId": "3EB063C771F28EB323FAE3",
        "participant": "71234567890@c.us"
    },
    "quotedMessage": {
        "stanzaId": "3EB063C771F28EB323FAE3",
        "participant": "71234567890@c.us",
        "typeMessage": "textMessage",
        "textMessage": "Hello! This is a text message."
    },
    "senderId": "71234567890@c.us",
    "senderName": "Green API",
    "senderContactName": "Green API inContacts"
}

To receive this type of notification, you must enable the "incomingWebhook" setting: "yes" in your personal account or using the [SetSettings](https://greenapi.com/en/docs/api/account/SetSettings/) method

body.raw:
{
    "type": "incoming",
    "idMessage": "E06893873B835B1A07",
    "timestamp": 1705520441,
    "typeMessage": "contactMessage",
    "chatId": "71234567890@c.us",
    "contact": {
        "displayName": "Alex Smit",
        "vcard": "BEGIN:VCARD\nVERSION:3.0\nN:Smit;Alex;;;\nFN:Alex Smit\nTEL;type=CELL;waid=72345678901:+7 234 567 8901\nEND:VCARD",
        "forwardingScore": 0,
        "isForwarded": false
    },
